name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-react-copilot-retrieval-api
title: Copilot Retrieval API Playground
shortDescription: This SPFx sample shows how to integrate a Copilot retrieval API into an SPFx web part and provides a hands‑on workflow to evaluate and tune search relevance.
longDescription: This SPFx sample shows how to integrate a Copilot retrieval API into an SPFx web part and provides a hands‑on workflow to evaluate and tune search relevance.

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
